definition: to revert (computing)/to return (a package or letter) to the sender
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
to retreat/to decline/to move back/to withdraw

sentences.english: Fallbacks can employ different strategies for handling conversion failures.
sentences.chinese: 回退可以採用不同的策略來處理轉換失敗。

sentences.english: Send the frames further back in time the longer the mouse button is pressed.
sentences.chinese: 鼠標按下時間越長，幀回退得越遠。

sentences.english: If interference is detected, they back off and retry.
sentences.chinese: 如果發現干擾，就會回退並重試。

sentences.english: Residents in northwest Ohio are busy mopping up as floodwaters there continue to recede.
sentences.chinese: 洪水繼續回退，俄亥俄州西北部的居民忙着清理。

sentences.english: There should be low risk of roll-back.
No one knows how long this recession will last.
sentences.chinese: 沒人會知道經濟回退將會持續多久。

sentences.english: In the second example, there was no rolling back from a hardware problem.
sentences.chinese: 對於第二個示例，無法對硬件問題執行回退。

sentences.english: That is because the fallback mechanism only works for instruction elements, not declarations.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲回退機制只能用於指令元素而不能用於聲明。

sentences.english: Comments should not be enclosed in large boxes drawn with asterisks or other characters.
sentences.chinese: 註釋中不能包含如分頁符與回退鍵等特殊字符。

sentences.english: If we click backward through the stack, the forward button lights up.
sentences.chinese: 如果在堆棧中回退，前進按鈕就變亮了。

definition: to proofread and correct/to edit and rectify/to correct/to calibrate
(of a mobile app) to crash on startup/to crash
